string.text: That's the way to get me!
Thanks for coming! Ooh, we're gonna get 'em now!
Thanks for coming! Ooh, we're gonna get 'em now!
Thanks for helping! Be sure to stop by our base! They'll thank you!
Thanks for helping! Be sure to stop by our base! You'll be thanked!
And there's a steim for friends!
And there's a mate with him!
You're going to die now, you bastard, you understand?
I'll give you an arsehole scolding for fascist signs!
Eh, it's twenty-five again. Okay, a case is a case.
Guys, we're not getting out right now. See what's up and what's going on?
I got your back! We're out!
Give him a light, and I'll bide!
Get those cheques in the house!
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!
How are we going to reveal the sala, huh?
Where the hell are you, Gat?
Hey you, don't think, you haven't left us yet!
We've found the enemy! Anyone who wants to help, come here!
Detect the enemy, who wants to help everyone here!
Bye bye mubyohi, ah your own!
You're planting your own, you idiot!
What are you, a goat herder?
You're a freak! Hands out of your arse!
What the fuck are you doing?
Well, I don't know, maybe this kind of income is not suitable for some people, and to me, it's a good time, you know, it's not just hubarto look for. Here's an idea.
I'll never part with my gun. I hold her in my arms, I sleep with her at my side. I'm with her, he, talking even. Well, let her think she's crazy, she's saved my life a thousand times over.
I still don't understand how things work in the zone. He's still trying to figure out the smart parts. I'm just a little man with a machine gun running around in the swamps.
Them, I'm gonna learn. I'd be like that too, not following and doing stuff like that I'd have walked around in one of those cool Kafandry ones before now, too.
It's all about keeping your head up. You don't know where fate will take you tomorrow. Maybe you'll remember these days as your happiest.
Meaning, meaning, personally, I don't think much about meaning. There's a task at hand, it pays well. So much for the point with motivation.
Life's been a little turbulent these days, you never know what surprises you'll get waiting behind a bush, and the pleasure of the job is gone, not that.

Everything flows, everything is broken, and nothing changes. Today we're sitting quietly, eating vodka, and tomorrow we'll already you've got to get the pepper somewhere, you've got to get the materials.
I'm sure the bosses know better, but I still want to do it sometimes to find out what we're all in this for.
What kind of people are these people? The eternal mahoots you know, yes truly get to the bottom of it. You catch her, true to this one.
We can't complain about life. Thank God we're not running around with stone axes. We can take care of ourselves if we need to.
I take it since the bosses are out there researching something, there must be a specific purpose. What's it to us, we're backup, we're armed, are, as they say, very dangerous.
Yeah, it's twist it, twist it, twist it, twist it, twist it, twist it, twist it, and it's gonna come out the way the commanders say it's gonna come out. Well, or whatever the zone decides?
That's the kind of thing anyone knows!
How about this one for you!

One day two stalkers meet, one says to the other, "You're you can you remember? You know, the one who told everyone how he was flying for three admissions. I remember from what? Is that what he is? The other day I hit a ski jump. Oh, man, that's it, you could say the man forgot a dream. It's flying!

Got lost one day in the boycott zone. So he's wandering round and round and shouting. People, somebody help me, and into the bush, and he's gone kerseyside and quiet. Yeah, yeah, yeah. So it's on the block, three to go, so ugly and bastardised. How'd you get up your arse? Right away, people, help!

Once a major interrogates such a stolterogu at a checkpoint. So you admit that you're in a neuter, as they tried to leave the area, and were carrying items prohibited from being taken outside of it. Well, that's why he's been under escort for three hours. He was drunk, I'll fucking admit it, commander, and if I'd been sober I'd have moved on with my life, past you dickheads I wouldn't go with a hubor.

A seasoned stalker is standing at a crossroads, and the signpost reads. To the right, anomalies and a bit of hubris. Forward, monsters are immense and mid-habor, left, pubs, chicks and booze, to boot. Well, he thought, he thought, he thought, and he went ahead. He thinks I've heard of it, but I've forgotten about it. I'll have to ask the men at the bar what the hell it is so ugly, the pubs and the girls.

A soldier got lost in the zone once. So he's walking wherever he looks and shouts. People! Get back to me! Somebody! Ow! Someone catches up with him and slaps him on the back of his rucksack. He turns round, and there he is, whoops! Bloodsucker's standing there, squelching him, so what are you yelling about, huh? Well, the lardass is already in his trousers, understandably, and the case is pissed, but he's still answering. I'm this, this is his. Confused! I'm shouting to see if anyone can hear me So the bloodsucker licked all his tentacles and he says, pretty much. Well, I heard, so what do we do now?

Caught, stalker mercenaries. Walked up to the well, dipped his head around his waist. After a minute, they pull it out and ask. Artefacts, dough, got any? He's not. Put it down again. Pestered, they ask. Artefacts, dough, got any? I don't. Dunked again, and asked again. Artefacts, dough, got any? But he couldn't take it. Man, you're going deeper than that. Or keep it longer. I can't fucking see.

The experienced stalker returns to his jeep. There's this one, there's a checker next to me. Stalker, get out of here while you're still in one piece. The controller must have taken offence. Are you out of your mind? I've needed your wreck for a hundred years. And the stalker will fire his own. I said to Valia. Let's say you can't steal it. But you can scribble some bollocks on it. I know you and the oxen.

A flimsy stalker returns home at three o'clock in the morning. So the wife is waiting with a frying pan. Stalker crawled into the flat, got the nut, threw it in the direction of the loo, puked it up, crawled over there. The wife watches in silence. Stalker threw up, lunged off the toilet, pulled out a nut, darted towards the bedroom, darted, darted, darted. Then his wife hits him over the head with a frying pan. Stalker passed out once, then regained consciousness, and instead of marking a new anomaly, he's mumbling. That's lucky.
Don't panic, bro! I'm a good doctor!
Hey! What do you want, stalker?
Yeah, whoever's in the zone doesn't get re-set.
Put the gun down, then we'll talk.
Just say what you want to say!
I don't know where to laugh.
Yeah, well, somehow no one, so you have to run to the baradats.
Now that's like a honey smear.
Oh, you're getting out of it!
Nayomnik, help me fight off the bandits!
Mercenary, help me fight off the bandits!
The Debtors are pressing in, help me get a handle on it!
The Long Islanders are on the move! Help the raionnir to cope!
Mate, we're pinned down by the freedom fighters, help!
Mate, it's all pinned on freedom, help!
Man, help me with my own!
Man, help me with my own!
Mercenary, this place is full of mutants, help me out, eh?
Mercenary, this place is full of mutants, help me out, eh?
Nayomnik, help me fight off the Stalkers!
Man, come on over here, the zombies are pissing us off!
Man, come to us, they'll be happy with you!
Well, in the meantime, issue a trousseau!
To see everything here, to look behind every bush!
And I want a 360 head spin, okay?
Come out, don't hide! Die like a man!
You can't hide from us, we'll cut you down!
But that's it, Gad, you're dead!
Here they come! Prepare to fight!
That's good stuff. I really am. It's a good one. Anything you want, I swear.

I don't know, maybe this kind of income is not suitable for some people, and it looks fine to me. You know, it's not just lugging stuff around, it's an idea.

Two stalkers meet one day. One to the other. Vass, do you remember? Well, the one who told everyone how he got into flying school three times. I remember. Why? Well, he got into a ski-jump the other day. Oh, man, that's it. A man's dream has been forgotten. He flew!

Once got lost in the warriors zone, so he wanders back and forth and yells, people, someone help, and in the bushes stalker sits and quietly stalking, yes, yes, yes, so at the checkpoint on the three hides to fight, so ugly and bastards, and as he got in the arse, so immediately people help!

A major is interrogating an old stolkeruga on a roadblock. So you admit to being drunk tried to leave the area and were carrying items prohibited from being taken outside of it. Well, the other one was sick of sitting under escort for three hours. He's gonna go bang, bang! I admit it, commander! I was drunk! I'd be sober! I wouldn't go past you bastards with the loot!

A seasoned stalker is standing at a crossroads, reading a signpost. To the right, anomalies and some loot. Front, monsters galore and medium-sized loot. To the left, pubs, girls and loads of loot. Well, he thought about it and moved on. He thinks I've heard of it, but I've forgotten about it. I'll have to ask the men at the bar, what's that weird stuff? Pubs and broads.

Got lost in the zone one day. So he's walking wherever he looks and shouts. People! Come on! Somebody! Awww! Someone catches up with him and slaps him on the back of his rucksack. He turns round, and there it is! Bloodsucker stands there and squelches him, so what are you yelling about, huh? Well, Solobon's already pissed his trousers, of course. Well, it does answer. I'm, um. I'm, um. I'm lost! I'm shouting to see if anyone can hear me And the Bloodsucker, then, with all his tentacles clothed and talking quite like this. Well, I heard, so what do we do now?

The mercenaries caught Stalker, approached the Olotz, dipped his head at the waist, after a minute they pull out and ask him "Got any Boblo artefacts?" He said, "No." They put it down again, pulled it out, said, "Got any Boblo artefacts?" "No." Dipped again and again they ask, "Any Boblo artefacts?" But he couldn't take it. Shit, you either go deeper or hold it longer. The bottom's muddy, I can't see shit

The experienced Stalker returns to his jeep. There's a checker next door makes a mistake. Stalker, get out of here while you're still in one piece. The controller must have taken offence. No, are you out of your mind? I've needed your wreck for ages. And Stalker's doing his thing. I said get out. Let's say you can't steal it. But you can scribble some nonsense. I know you bastards.

The stalker crawled into the flat, pulled out a nut, threw it in the direction of the loo, poked it, crawled over there. The wife watches in silence. Stalker threw up, crawled out of the toilet, pulled out a nut, darted towards the bedroom, poked and prodded, crawled. Then his wife hit him over the head with a frying pan! Stalker passed out once, then regained consciousness, got the map, marks the location of a new anomaly and mumbles. Well, that's lucky.
That's the way to get me!
He poked me in the gado!
Calm down, I'm not going out!
Come on, I'll go get him!
Cover him up, I'll mould him!
I'm mine, where are you shooting at?
Come on, I'm my own man, what the hell?
No slacking off without a team!
Prodinnik is nearby looking and howling!
Not near the snow, we're all scouting!
Ahn is around here somewhere, he can't have gone far!
You can't get away from us!
Pereat! We'll kill you, you bastard!
Bear with me, brother, we're gonna fix it.
Guys, how about playing with them and playing with sho?
Well, what's in it for you?
He's 100 years old and he's got a beard like that!
Look, would you quit the hahmit, you know, the ballot word.
Should I learn how to play the piano myself?
No, well, this is a bad time for you.
I'd like to jump up and down for about 600 minutes.
And somehow mine would know something from them.
My band, no-one else, no-one else.
Well, go on, all the way to zero. And we can't get discouraged yet, oh, we can't.
When we get back, whoever's left alive.
But I'll be back, after this, it'll be good anywhere in any hole.
However, things are clearly going to shit. We've been steaming around here for a while now, and there's hardly any underfoot.
Oh, how much more junk is there to clean and clean?
You should have run more loaches, cos you knew it.
Yeyo, kinpalk, I forgot to check old bookmarks again, to see if anyone's been messing with them.
Ooh, I could use a good fire right about now.
No, it doesn't matter. If we don't make a show, we're not getting out of here. We don't have that on the right. God forbid the world like this, but it will crawl out.
Yes, that's the job, to protect my friend, to find out who depends on the circus, to answer.
Smakon, what can I do for you, Stalfer?
All right, lad, hide the gun?
Put your gun away, then we can talk.
Have you ever heard of that?
And now for a musical pause!
Let me play for you, huh? What should I play?
Eh, without music, there's no joy.

Meeting and two stalkers. Do you know about Vasya, the one who wanted to be a lechik when he was a kid? What about him? He hit the Trumpline yesterday. Whoops! Well, a man's dream has come true, you might say. I'm flying!

Stalker came to the bonesetter, complaining, Doctor, he's completely asleep I can't. As soon as I fell asleep, as if I were in a sarcovagus, me boring island locked up. Ooh, you must be the controller warning you. So the next time you're out in the field, don't forget to leave the bottle with him, or else thank you, Doctor, Sure, sure, you're welcome, says the supervisor. That's for the doctor, that's right, thank you, made the old man happy.

Worth a crossroads stalker in the zone, and the signs read, right, anomalies. Front, monsters, left, pubs and broads. The stalker thought, thought, and went forward, thinking, if I survive, I'll have to ask them what the horrors are such new, strange, pubs and girls.

Stalker got lost. He's walking and shouting. People, hello! Hey, somebody! Suddenly, someone slapped him from behind. He turns round, there's a big, well, scary, crowded creature. And she says to him sadly. What are you yelling about, Stalker? I'm just lost. I think maybe someone will hear, Creature sighs. Well, I heard, but the point.

Walks a young stalker in the zone, suddenly the lake, which is not on the map. He's back and forth, then some bloke is watching, not far away, looming. Well, the young man came to him and asked him, "Honoured one, how would I get round this lake," he replied. Come on, I'll show you on the way. Well, I'm walking, I'm walking, and the young one asks. You probably know every bush around here, and since you walk around unarmed, you're not afraid. The man laughs, who does he say he's afraid of? You know, monsters and zombies and controllers. The man thought, you said, okay, monsters, shmonsters, that's understandable. Zombies are still around. Well, the nasta, the controllers, there's nothing to be afraid of.

Ripped off a piece of roof slate once at a freedom fighters' base, got somebody hurt. As always there's a lot of people here, all sympathetic, Yeah, well, it's easier than a proper slate nailing. Well, Bol, tough luck for the man. Then we took a closer look, and it's not a man, it's a zombie. Wandered right onto the property, and what do you think, did they start head-grabbing to reinforce the posts? Mihrina! They're getting more and more hurt. It's a terrible thing, you've got no place to spit. That's when all the pores get killed.

Not dispersed in the zone, mercenaries and bandits. Well, we jumped up, got our guns, and started fighting. And the traffic warden at the crossroads is happy. That's how lucky I am to have chosen this place. I've been wanting to go to a real Podsan showdown for a long time.

You've got some more antigong put on you, hamster. I don't even close mine, so who's afraid? Well, the other one didn't say a word, but he closed the door. So he comes back from the bar. And the cool molch is standing by his car, like a comedian, and only looks at the salon. Stanker comes over, looks too, and then, sympathetically like this. Yeah, bad luck, mate. I had this happen to me once. I didn't secure the doors, so the Boorers got in and fucked them up all dead.
Are you out of your mind?
Go on, you've got something to do, waking up Jews.
Put the gun away and we'll talk.

Vera, past it by the gills!

Now we're going to mould the beauties!
Salkera, there's duty, we're on our way!
That's it, Kir, there's a duty, it's mine!
Bear with me, brother, we're gonna fix it.
